Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class DevelopCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.DevelopCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
LeaderDevelopCard
public class DevelopCard
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a DevelopCard that can be bought by a player or discarded in the Solo game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Color color
    This attribute represents the color of the current card.
    private ResourceAmount[] cost
    This attribute represents the cost of the current card: for each type of resource, it specifies th amount requested in order to buy the card.
    private int faithOutput
    This attribute specifies the faith output of the production of the current card (>=0).
    private int id
    This attribute is the id of the card: it is sent to the client as a representation of the card
    private ResourceAmount[] input
    This attribute represents the resources requested to activate the production specified by the current card.
    private int level
    This attribute specifies the level of the current card.
    private ResourceAmount[] output
    This attribute specifies the resources produced by the current card when the production is done correctly.
    private int victoryPoints
    This attribute specifies the victory points given by the current card.

    It instantiates a single DevelopCard.

  • Constructor Details

    • DevelopCard

      public DevelopCard​(int level, int victoryPoints, int faithOutput, Color color, ResourceAmount[] cost, ResourceAmount[] input, ResourceAmount[] output, int id)
      It instantiates a single DevelopCard.
      Parameters:
      level - : it specifies the level of the card.
      victoryPoints - : it specifies the victory points given by the card.
      faithOutput - : it specifies the faith output of the card.
      color - : it specifies the color of the card.
      cost - : it specifies the cost of the card (in order to buy it).
      input - : it specifies the input requested to activate the production of the card.
      output - : it specifies the output produced by the card.

    • activateProduction

      public int activateProduction​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> map, ResourceAmount[] strongbox, java.util.List<ResourceAmount> deposits, ResourceAmount[] strongboxOutput) throws InvalidActionException
      Method to activate a production on a single Develop Card
      Parameters:
      map - : the map indicates which resource and from where you want to take it, to start a production
      strongbox - : indicates the reference to the strongbox
      deposits - : indicates the reference to the deposits
      strongboxOutput - : indicates the output strongbox, which contains the resources that have been produced
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException

    • buyDevelopCard

      public void buyDevelopCard​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> map, ResourceAmount[] strongbox, java.util.List<ResourceAmount> deposits) throws InvalidActionException
      Method to buy the develop card
      Parameters:
      map - : the map indicates which resource and from where you want to take it, to buy a Develop Card
      strongbox - : indicates the reference to the strongbox
      deposits - : indicates the reference to the deposits
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException
